data.name: Fossilfuel Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Fossilfuel Demo contains the Sierra transfer station portion of the game, a section that makes up about 1/4 of the main campaign.

The demo will give players a taste of the terror that is Fossilfuel!
data.about_the_game:
The Fossilfuel Demo contains the Sierra transfer station portion of the game, a section that makes up about 1/4 of the main campaign.

The demo will give players a taste of the terror that is Fossilfuel!
data.short_description: The free demo allows players a chance to play a sizable portion of the Fossilfuel singleplayer campaign.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 or better
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel core i7-9700k or AMD 3700x or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 ti or AMD Radeon 5700 XT or better
  • Storage: 11 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: You are encouraged to make youtube videos featuring Fossilfuel.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has scary dinosaurs and some mild blood. The use of guns to shoot dinosaurs is accompanied by scary sounds. Mild language is also used. This game's target audience is over 13 years of age.
